This rule redirects Google Search to **Perplexity**, allowing you to use Perplexity as your default search engine.

**Perplexity** is an AI-powered search and answer engine that combines the breadth of web search with conversational, context-aware responses, helping you find accurate information quickly and efficiently.

**Perplexity:** https://www.perplexity.ai
